label: Documentation
description: Original and downloaded data sources clearly described.

label: Documentation
description: Poor description of original and / or downloaded data sources.

label: Documentation
description: Poor / unclear / missing description of either original or downloaded data source

label: Research questions
description: At least 3 RQs & associated data variables listed.

label: Research questions
description: <3 RQs listed or variables are missing.

label: Research questions
description: <3 RQs listed and variables are missing.

label: Exploration
description: Summary measures and charts appropriately used to address all RQs; excellent summary description.

label: Exploration
description: Measures and charts used to address RQs could be improved; adequate summary description.

label: Exploration
description: Missing summary measures and / or charts to address RQs; poor summary description.

label: Visualizations
description: Visualizations appropriately chosen according to data types and / or relationships.

label: Visualizations
description: Visualizations are appropriate but could be improved.

label: Visualizations
description: Poor match between visualization and data types / relationships, and / or missing.

label: Technical things
description: All code runs without errors; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has only one or two error, otherwise runs; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has multiple errors; submitted .zip file is missing components necessary to reproduce analysis.
